name: Firebird Aggregator
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en: FBA (Firebird Aggregator token) is a token with multi-chain utilities, designed for maximum revenue. First-of-its-kind, FBA is equipped with an multichain cashback feature that rewards users for swapping, while also saving them on swap fees. After earning through swapping, FBA can be staked for profit-share from all chains where Firebird Aggregator is operational for additional rewards.
